channel.description: Recent content in open-source on Stefan Gloutnikov

item.title: Dataset Release: Six Years of SiriusXM Now Playing Data
item.description: My Sirius XM now playing tracker has been running for six years without any major interruptions. Today I gathered all of the data collected to date, and am open sourcing the dataset for anyone can use.
